means: 使士气低落，使意志消沉

sentence.Network_en: Constant criticism is enough to demoralize anybody.
sentence.Network_cn: 频繁的批评足以使任何人意志消沉。

sentence.Network_en: Clearly, one of the objectives is to demoralize the enemy troops in any way they can.
sentence.Network_cn: 很明显，目标之一就是要用一切可能的手段打击敌军的士气。

sentence.Network_en: Frequent gyrations in our national direction demoralize the Foreign Service.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在基本国策上的多变性,常使外交部门陷于混乱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 游戏英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 士气 Morale 士气受挫 Demoralize 挫志咆哮 Demoralizing Shout.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... demise 死亡 demoralize 使沮丧,败坏 demote 降级.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... demonstrate 证明，论证；示威 demoralize 使士气低落 demote 降级，降职.
蓝宝词典 ... demonstrate v. 论证，证明 demoralize vt. 使道德颓废；使堕落；挫折锐气 demotic adj. 通俗的，大众化的.

list.abs: do not forgive their iniquity and let not their sin be blotted out before You , for they have demoralized the builders .尼4:5不要遮掩他们的罪孽、不要使他们的罪恶从你面前涂抹．因为他们在修造的人眼前惹动你的怒气。
Constant criticism is enough demoralize anybody ., 频繁的批评足以使任何人意志消沉.

list.exp: 丧失自信心、削弱勇气或志气的话语
list.abs: sàngqìhuà[demoralizing word] 丧失自信心、削弱勇气或志气的话语丧权辱国
the rejection can leave you demoralized .拒绝会让你失去斗志。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French démoraliser (a word of the French Revolution), from dé- (expressing reversal) + moral 'moral', from Latin moralis

entry.tran: 使士气低落;使失去信心;使泄气
entry.def: If something demoralizes someone, it makes them lose so much confidence in what they are doing that they want to give up.

example.ex: Clearly, one of the objectives is to demoralize the enemy troops in any way they can.
example.tran: 很明显，目标之一就是要用一切可能的手段打击敌军的士气。

means.word_mean: 1. corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality;

sentences.sentence: "debauch the young people with wine and women"
"Socrates was accused of corrupting young men"
"The bad state of her child's health demoralizes her"
"the boss's behavior demoralized everyone in the office"

auth_sentence.content: To debase, demoralize, and debilitate human nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: To debase, demoralize, and debilitate human nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To debase, demoralize, and debilitate human nature.

means.word_mean: 使士气低落,使意志消沉

sentences.en: They have left the teaching profession, demoralized and undervalued.
sentences.cn: 他们已经离开了教学行业，意志消沉，受人轻视。
